title: Bloomberg Markets: Terrorism Has Little Impact on Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Terrorism Has Little Impact on Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Chris Cordaro Chief Executive Officer RegentAtlantic Discussing how geoplotical events impact markets and his investment strategy.
